/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway is teeming with vehicles, including cars and buses, all moving in the same direction. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. On either side of the highway, there are trees and buildings, adding to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, making the vehicles appear larger and more prominent. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various colors of the vehicles.
